title: Engraver - SoCal OC
content:
I was wondering if any of you could recommend an engraver in the Orange County area. I am designing a custom wedding invitation (save the date, reply, place cards, etc.) for a client. I was originally referred to Burdge in LA, however they are B2B and being in LA is a bit out of the way. Any/all suggestions are greatly appreciated!

 [‹ Coop Flaired](http://web.archive.org/web/20080719172615/http:/typophile.com/node/35828 "Go to previous forum topic") [TypeCon2008 Buffalo ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080719172615/http:/typophile.com/node/35724 "Go to next forum topic")
author: umlautthoni

comments.content:
Here is one listed as an AIGA partner:

[http://www.burnettengraving.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080719172615/http:/www.burnettengraving.com/ "http://www.burnettengraving.com/")

It’s over in the area where the 91 & 55 come together.  
I hope that helps.
Thank you very much for the referral. Kind of ironic, it’s right around the corner from where I work - so to speak. I’m at the 91 and 57, but I take the 55 to the 91. . .

I’m not sure I’d want the temptation of working that close to Fry’s.  
; )
